h2_title: Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide
content: When his health bar is depleted, Erlang will turn into a bird and fly off. The Destined One will follow, and you'll soon be clashing in the sky.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Erlang,_The_Sacred_Divinity.md', within the main section titled 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When his health bar is depleted, Erlang will turn into a bird and fly off. The Destined One will follow, and you'll soon be clashing in the sky.
